description: The Geonames ontologies provides elements of description for geographical features, in particular those defined in the geonames.org data base
label: The Geonames ontology

GeonamesFeature.description: A feature described in geonames database, uniquely defined by its geonames identifier
GeonamesFeature.label: Geonames Feature

Map.description: A Web page displaying a map
Map.label: Map

RDFData.description: A Document containing RDF description of one or several features.
RDFData.label: RDF Data

skos:notation.description: Used to store the values of feature codes
skos:notation.label: notation

countryCode.description: A two letters country code in the ISO 3166 list
countryCode.label: ISO country code

name.description: The main international name of a feature. The value has no xml:lang tag.
name.label: name

officialName.description: A name in an official local language
officialName.label: official name

childrenFeatures.description: Links to an RDF document containing the descriptions of children features
childrenFeatures.label: children features

featureClass.description: The main category of the feature, as defined in geonames taxonomy.
featureClass.label: feature class

featureCode.description: Type of the feature, as defined in geonames taxonomy.
featureCode.label: feature code

locatedIn.description: Indicates that the subject resource is located in the object feature
locatedIn.label: located in

locationMap.description: A geonames map centered on the feature.
locationMap.label: map

nearby.description: A feature close to the reference feature
nearby.label: nearby

nearbyFeatures.description: Links to an RDF document containing the descriptions of nearby features
nearbyFeatures.label: nearby features

neighbour.description: A feature sharing a common boarder with the reference feature
neighbour.label: neighbour

neighbouringFeatures.description: Links to an RDF document containing the descriptions of neighbouring features. Applies when the feature has definite boarders.
neighbouringFeatures.label: neighbouring features

parentFeature.description: A feature parent of the current one, in either administrative or physical subdivision.
parentFeature.label: parent feature

wikipediaArticle.description: A Wikipedia article of which subject is the resource.
wikipediaArticle.label: wikipedia article
